message:
Hi {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to inform you that your job offer has been updated. Please review the updated details of your offer for the position of {{ doc.position }} at {{ doc.company }}.

Updated Offer Details:

  • Position: {{ doc.position }}
  • Salary: {{ doc.salary }}
  • Start Date: {{ doc.start_date }}
  • Benefits: {{ doc.benefits }}

We encourage you to review the updated offer and let us know if you have any questions. Please check your Candidate Portal for further details.

We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Resend Job Offer
subject: Find Your Updated Job Offer - {{ doc.job_offer_title }}
